title: Sion skin idea
body:
When the sion rework was revealed there was a concept image of sion before he died
[ ( Refering to this image )](http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140925221342/leagueoflegends/images/e/eb/Sion_portrait.png)

Human sion looks pretty badass and I'd really  think it'd be an awesome skin.

> [{quoted}](name=MT Skjar,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hLpYimfY,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-25T00:00:01.755+0000)
>
> all Sion skins except his classic look pretty doofy tbh

LOL tru

Tough to do.
Let me put it this way: Sion was resurrected as a hulking, patched-together copy of his former self. His memory is almost gone, his martial prowess is a pale shadow of what it used to be, his body is heavily damaged. He's a slow, lumbering wreck that's only a ghost of what he was in life. But he *still* can fight on the level of other champions.

Now sit back and consider how **absolutely terrifying** Sion must have been before he died.

*Is **this** what passes for **war**?*
Lore wise, all the Ascended will win any fight easy with 0 effort though, but yes, Sion must have been a nightmare to behold, for mortals at least.

The dude literally sprinted through a camp filled with Demacians to burst into the command tent like "SURPRISE MOTHER F&@#3&" and then he killed Jarvan the Second. Then he killed people for a while, then eventually enough of the Demacians ganged up on him that he died. And Noxus was still able to recover enough of the body to put together the Sion that is in the game...Including J2's crown which they used for his lower jaw....

I ***THIS*** what passes for ***WAR***!?



(although i do think a Noxian Exemplar skin for scion with his pre death look would be very cool)

Im main sion and I agree we need a skin like this. It should be called general sion or pre death sion.
Maybe they could make it so he has his missing foot back and he walks normal. 
Please riot make this skin, we need it!

Im not sure if this is the right place to put this but i think it would be bad ass if riot did a pirate skin for sion you could call it bildgewater sion and give him a beard, a pirate hat, a parrot,  and then the hand not carrying his axe could be a cannon for when he does his E

If I remember correctly, they were just experimenting with how he could look with hair.  That isn't necessarily a picture of him prior to death, but a picture of him as the Undead Juggernaut with hair.  Needless to say, they felt like it wasn't fitting.
